channel.title: Runserver error :eek: autosave timer?
channel.description:
Starting special edition FighterScape PK, Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2973 Client type: low memory version UserId: 6212187 Fighter_bosz is signing onto server. LOADED: 0 [client-1-Fighter_bosz]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-Fighter_bosz]: playerCommand: coordson [client-1-Fighter_bosz]: Auto saved game. [b]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 24 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:27454) at client.process(client.java:14241) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3114 Client type: low memory version UserId: 6212187 Fighter_bosz is signing onto server. [client-2-Fighter_bosz]: Fighter_bosz is already online. Batchopdracht beëindigen (J/N)?[/b]
every time my server is on between 2 and 10 minites, this happens. how to fix it?
and were to edit the autosave timer?
help? :|

item.title: Runserver error :eek: autosave timer?
item.dc:creator: @xiokiller xiokiller
item.description:
@xiokiller wrote:

Starting special edition FighterScape PK, Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2973
Client type: low memory version
UserId: 6212187
Fighter_bosz is signing onto server.
LOADED: 0
[client-1-Fighter_bosz]: Case 130: 0
[client-1-Fighter_bosz]: playerCommand: coordson
[client-1-Fighter_bosz]: Auto saved game.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind
ex out of range: 24
at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source)
at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source)
at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:27454)
at client.process(client.java:14241)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:47)
ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3114
Client type: low memory version
UserId: 6212187
Fighter_bosz is signing onto server.
[client-2-Fighter_bosz]: Fighter_bosz is already online.
Batchopdracht beëindigen (J/N)?

every time my server is on between 2 and 10 minites, this happens.
how to fix it?

and were to edit the autosave timer?

help?
